titles.title: To amend the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to reduce the amount that a multicandidate political committee may contribute to a House of Representatives candidate.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 5/26/1993--Introduced. Amends the Federal Election Campaign Act of 1971 to reduce the maximum contribution amount that a multicandidate political committee (PAC) may make to a House of Representatives candidate.
